attributes.action: Publicise the projected total annual costs of final pension salary schemes in Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that evermore private-sector final salary schemes are being withdrawn or closed to new employees, the time is right to evaluate the overall cost of those pensions directed towards parliamentarians to determine whether they are sustainable, bearable by the public purse, and considered cost-effective by the electorate.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
